npcs.name: questgiver
npcs.desc: Mr. Reitmeier stands around, looking impatient.
npcs.look_string: This is a short man with brown hair and a mustache. He does not seem particularly interesting.
dialogue: As you approach, Mr. Reitmeier turns toward you and barks, "Hey, what are you doing here? This area is off-limits!"
"If you want to pass through, you'll have to bribe me with at least six **shillings**", he says.
